name: OnFuelDrain()
description:
What do you do when you are running out of fuel? Just get hit hard and often!

What if bullets powered your spaceship? OnFuelDrain() is a game about balancing fuel and health -- get hit and you'll gain fuel. Get hit too much, and you'll die.

Source code for the game can be found here:  github.com/Ariawyn/ld39-spacegame-v2

Music from Jukedeck - create your own at http://jukedeck.com

OnFuelDrain() is made by:

Aría Jónsdóttir:

  • quietaria.itch.io
  • github.com/Ariawyn
